tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE clients_contact_information (
    client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    email_address TEXT UNIQUE,
    phone_number TEXT,
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE clients (
  client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE communications (
  communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  communication_type VARCHAR(50),
  communication_date DATE,
  communication_content TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES clients(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE addresses (
    address_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT REFERENCES clients(client_id),
    address_line1 TEXT NOT NULL,
    address_line2 TEXT,
    city TEXT NOT NULL,
    state TEXT NOT NULL,
    postal_code TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE contact_history (
    contact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT REFERENCES clients(client_id),
    contact_date DATE NOT NULL,
    contact_method TEXT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE client_contacts (
    contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE contact_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contact_id INT,
    history_date DATE,
    history_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contact_id) REFERENCES client_contacts(contact_id)
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contact_id INT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    communication_type VARCHAR(20),
    notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contact_id) REFERENCES client_contacts(contact_id)
);

CREATE TABLE updates_history (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contact_id INT,
    update_date TIMESTAMP,
    update_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contact_id) REFERENCES client_contacts(contact_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Clients (
    client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Contacts (
    contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT NOT NULL,
    contact_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    CONSTRAINT fk_client FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Clients(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Subscriptions (
    sub_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT NOT NULL,
    subscription_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_client_subs FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Clients(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Updates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT NOT NULL,
    update_msg TEXT NOT NULL,
    update_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_client_updates FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Clients(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT NOT NULL,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    notes TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_client_interactions FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Clients(client_id)
);
